00168         if(this->RMG_Available)
00169         {

void CustomTheater::LoadFromINIList ( CCINIClass *  ini  )  [static] 

00049 {
00050         static char section[] = "Theaters";
00051 
00052         Debug::Log("Initializing theaters...\n");
00053         if(ini->GetSection(section))
00054         {
00055                 char buffer[0x10] = "\0";
00056                 size_t bufferSize = 0x10;
00057 
00058                 int n = ini->GetKeyCount(section);
00059                 for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00060                 {
00061                         const char* key = ini->GetKeyName(section, i);
00062                         if(ini->ReadString(section, key, "", buffer, bufferSize))
00063                         {
00064                                 //check if already exists
00065                                 if(!CustomTheater::Find(buffer))
00066                                 {
00067                                         CustomTheater* theater;
00068                                 
00069                                         //find stock theater
00070                                         Theater* stockTheater = CustomTheater::FindStock(buffer);
00071                                         if(stockTheater)
00072                                                 theater = new CustomTheater(stockTheater);
00073                                         else
00074                                                 theater = new CustomTheater(buffer);
00075                                         
00076                                         CustomTheater::Array.AddItem(theater);
00077                                 }
00078                         }
00079                 }
00080         }
00081         else if(Array.Count == 0)
00082         {
00083                 //add stock theaters
00084                 for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00085                         CustomTheater::Array.AddItem(new CustomTheater(&Theater::Array[i]));
00086                 
00087                 //set defaults for new stuff
00088                 CustomTheater::Array[0]->RMG_Available = true; //temperate
00089                 CustomTheater::Array[1]->RMG_Available = true; //snow
00090                 CustomTheater::Array[3]->RMG_Available = true; //desert
00091         }
00092         
00093         for(int i = 0; i < CustomTheater::Array.Count; i++)
00094         {
00095                 Debug::Log("\t%s\n", CustomTheater::Array[i]->Identifier);
00096                 CustomTheater::Array[i]->LoadFromINI(ini);
00097         }
00098 }

void CustomTheater::ReadIntArray ( CCINIClass *  ini,
const char *  section,

DynamicVectorClass< int > *  array 
) [private] 

00111 {
00112         if(ini->ReadString(section, key, "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength))
00113         {
00114                 for(char* x = strtok(Ares::readBuffer, ","); x; x = strtok(NULL, ","))
00115                         array->AddItem(atoi(x));
00116         }
00117 }
